name: Gwen Stacy (sidecut / Spiderverse hairstyle)
description:
This is my first Lora, it's far from perfect. Trained on SD 1.5 with 18 images, some screengrabs from the movie and some fanart.

I saw there was already a Gwen Stacy lora on here, but couldn't get it to generate the character's signature sidecut (shaved side of hair) from the Into the Spiderverse movie, so I made this.

Recommended weight is 0.3 - 0.65 depending on the model and style.

It does a good job recalling the look of the character, but depending on the model you might get VERY blue eyes with almost no pupil, so I find a stylized look works best. Though if you tweak your prompt and settings enough you can get great photorealistic results as shown in the examples. Just for the love of god don't make her smile with her teeth unless you know a good AI dentist.

Trigger word is gwen_stacy

I also recommend ''sidecut'', ''asymmetrical_hair'', ''parted_lips''

Triggers words like ''spider-suit'', ''bodysuit'', ''hoodie'', ''spider-web_print'' can be added to prompt or negative prompt depending if you want them or not.

Can make NSFW content as shown in the examples, but will not automatically go towards that. I recommend using the negative prompts I just listed if you want to go that way.

meta.prompt: <lora:gwen_stacy_spiderverse_v1:0.65>, (masterpiece), ((best quality)), parted lips, light_smile, cinematic lighting, ultra-realistic, ((realistic)), (gwen_stacy), blonde_hair, short_hair, solo, sidecut, asymmetrical_hair, parted_lips, eyebrow_piercing, (detailed face), beautiful 1girl, 1girl, looking at viewer, (beautiful detailed eyes), bodysuit, spider-suit, white hoodie, hood_down, portrait, upper_body, (side of head shaved), (small breasts)
meta.negativePrompt: worst quality, low quality, error, bad anatomy, nipples, nipple, hands, bad hands, worst quality, low quality, error, bad anatomy, bad artist, extra limbs, bad prompt, (see-through), worst quality, low quality, error, bad anatomy, bad artist, extra limbs, nipples, bad prompt

meta.prompt: <lora:gwen_stacy_v1.1:0.8>, ((masterpiece)), (cinematic lighting), a close-up, beautiful stylized illustration of gwen_stacy, with a sidecut, asymetrical blonde hair, with incredibly detailed blue eyes and a beautiful detailed face, with parted lips, the side of her head shaved, in a black and white spider-suit with red interior, in the forest in automn, by jeremy mann, by sandra chevrier, by dave mckean and richard avedon and maciej kuciara, high detailed, 8k,  samdoesart style
meta.negativePrompt: worst quality, low quality, error, bad anatomy, side view, bad prompt, black and white, low saturation, multiple panels, bad hands, extra fingers, bad artist, extra limbs, (see-through)
